casebody.data:
Josh GRIFFITH, Appellant, v. UNITED STATES of America, Appellee. No. 5853. Circuit Court of Appeals, Fifth Circuit. Dec. 13, 1930. D. C. Bland, of Orange, Tex., for appellant. S. D. Bennett, Asst. U. S. Atty., of Beaumont, Tex. (Randolph Bryant, U. S. Atty., of Sherman, Tex., on the brief), for the United States.

Before BRYAN, FOSTER, and WALKER, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

The judgment is affirmed.
